content:
You're really getting into the Halloween spirit!

I'm happy to tell you more about the Haunted Mansion Holiday and Guardians of the Galaxy - Monsters After Dark ride overlays.

**Haunted Mansion Holiday:**
This beloved attraction gets a seasonal makeover every year, transforming it into a spooky-ooky celebration of Halloween and Christmas. The Haunted Mansion Holiday features Jack Skellington and his friends from The Nightmare Before Christmas, who take over the mansion to decorate it for the holidays.

The queue and interior of the mansion are decked out in cobwebs, jack-o'-lanterns, and Christmas decorations, creating a delightfully eerie atmosphere. The ride's special effects, lighting, and audio are also tweaked to fit the holiday theme. You'll encounter Jack, Sally, and other characters from the film, as well as some new and familiar ghosts from the Haunted Mansion.

**Guardians of the Galaxy - Monsters After Dark:**
This ride overlay is a relatively new addition to the Mickey's Halloween Party festivities. During the event, the Guardians of the Galaxy - Mission: Breakout! attraction transforms into Guardians of the Galaxy - Monsters After Dark.

In this version, Rocket Raccoon has discovered that the monsters from the Fortress of Fear have escaped, and it's up to you to help him contain them. The ride's queue and interior are redecorated with creepy lighting, fog, and projection effects to create a monster-filled atmosphere.

The ride's storyline and scenes are altered to feature the escaped monsters, and you'll encounter some new and frightening creatures along the way. The ride's audio and special effects are also adjusted to fit the spooky theme.

**Space Mountain: Ghost Galaxy:**
I'm glad you enjoyed Space Mountain: Ghost Galaxy during your visit! This high-speed, indoor roller coaster gets a Halloween makeover, featuring a ghostly, space-themed overlay. The ride's queue and interior are transformed with eerie lighting, fog, and projection effects, creating a haunted space station atmosphere.

The ride's audio and special effects are also tweaked to fit the theme, with ghostly sounds and visuals throughout the ride. It's a thrilling and chilling experience that's perfect for the Halloween season.

All three of these ride overlays offer a unique and spooky twist on the classic Disneyland attractions, making them a must-ride during Mickey's Halloween Party. Have a blast when you visit again this year!
